definition: letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random

sentences.english: Carlo Ancelotti has often spoke highly of Ricardo and expressed his confidence in the striker.
sentences.chinese: 安切罗蒂一直对奥里韦拉有很高的信心。

sentences.english: It exhorts to faith and courage.
But the weak states remain vulnerable to a loss of confidence by depositors.
sentences.chinese: 一旦储户信心丧失，弱国仍将面临巨大风险。

sentences.english: She had too little faith in mankind not to know that they were erring .
sentences.chinese: 她对男人们没有信心，知道他们总要犯错误的。

sentences.english: However, this does not prevent us from the start of their feelings of confidence.
sentences.chinese: 可是，这并不妨碍我们对彼此感情地久天长的信心。

sentences.english: Confidence is key to the success of Andrey Arshavin, according to Arsène Wenger.
sentences.chinese: 对于阿沙文来说他所需要地仅仅只是信心。

sentences.english: Have faith and confidence in the Triple Gem.
sentences.chinese: 具足信对佛法僧的信心与敬心。

sentences.english: These improved economic conditions are all helping to boost confidence.
sentences.chinese: 这些好转的经济环境对提振信心百益而无一害。

sentences.english: The Biancocelesti are the runaway leaders at the top of Serie A and confidence is high at Formello.
sentences.chinese: 目前拉齐奥正在积分榜上领跑，球队信心十足。

sentences.english: "We cannot allow a crisis in our financial system to become a crisis in confidence," he said.
sentences.chinese: 我们不能允许金融体系中的危机演变成信心危机。

sentences.english: But I am confident that we are finally headed in the right direction.
sentences.chinese: 但我对于我们最终在正确的方向上前进充满信心。

sentences.english: I have great faith in all of you.
sentences.chinese: 我对你们大家有极大的信心。

sentences.english: A performance based pricing structure instils confidence.
sentences.chinese: 性能为基础的定价结构灌输信心。

sentences.english: Hold them steadily before Him in faith and prayer.
sentences.chinese: 用信心和祷告带到他面前来。

sentences.english: After tough training, I got rid of my self-abasement and became confident.
sentences.chinese: 经过艰苦的训练，使我增强了自信心，消除了自卑感。

sentences.english: But also large enough to give us some confidence.
sentences.chinese: 足够给我们一些对于程序的信心。

definition: determination/resolution/determined/firm and resolute/to make up one's mind/CL:個|个[ge4]
to sway/to waver/to rock/to rattle/to destabilize/to pose a challenge to
attitude (of the heart)/state of one's psyche/way of thinking/mentality
